1370: Herlewin moved to Appel Marckt.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 23 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Trame, at age 24.
1372: Had a son with Gertrudis, Werenboud, at age 25.
1374: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Riet, at age 27.
1375: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Natelien, at age 28.
1377: Had a son with Gertrudis, Kolekinus, at age 30.
Lost son Kolekinus when Kolekinus was 1 years old.
1378: Lost daughter Natelien when Natelien was 4 years old.
1379: Lost son Vais when Vais was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Gertrudis gave birth to their stillborn son Vais in 1379.
1383: Lost his wife Gertrudis while she was giving birth to Karis in 1383.
Lost son Karis when Karis was 1 years old.
1386: Lost son Werenboud when Werenboud was 15 years old.
